16 
17 void ORCAAgent::ComputeNewVelocity()
18 {
19  ORCALines.clear();
20 
21 
22  // Получение ORCA-линий препятсвий
23  for (int i = 0; i < NeighboursObst.size(); i++)
24  {
25  Line line;
26 
27  Vertex *left = &(NeighboursObst[i].second.left);
28  Vertex *right = &(NeighboursObst[i].second.right);
29 
30  Vector lRelativePosition = *left - position;
31  Vector rRelativePosition = *right - position;
32 
33 
34  bool alreadyCovered = false;
35 
36  for (int j = 0; j < ORCALines.size(); j++)
37  {
38  if ((lRelativePosition * invTimeBoundaryObst - ORCALines[j].liesOn).Det(ORCALines[j].dir) - invTimeBoundaryObst * fakeRadius >= -CN_EPS &&
39  (rRelativePosition * invTimeBoundaryObst - ORCALines[j].liesOn).Det(ORCALines[j].dir) - invTimeBoundaryObst * fakeRadius >= -CN_EPS)
40  {
41  alreadyCovered = true;
42  break;
43  }
44  }
45  if (alreadyCovered)
46  continue;
47 
48  float lSqDist = lRelativePosition.SquaredEuclideanNorm();
49  float rSqDist = rRelativePosition.SquaredEuclideanNorm();
50 
51  float sqFakeRadius = fakeRadius * fakeRadius;
52  float sqTrueRadius = param.radius * param.radius;
53 
54  Vector obstacleVector = *right - *left;
55  float s = -lRelativePosition.ScalarProduct(obstacleVector) / obstacleVector.SquaredEuclideanNorm();
56  float lineSqDist = (-lRelativePosition - obstacleVector * s).SquaredEuclideanNorm();
57 
58  if ((s < 0.0f && lSqDist < sqTrueRadius) || (s > 1.0f && rSqDist < sqTrueRadius) ||
59  (s >= 0.0f && s < 1.0f && lineSqDist < sqTrueRadius))
60  {
61  collisionsObst++;
62  }
63 
64 
65  if (s < 0.0f && lSqDist < sqFakeRadius)
66  {
67 
68  if (left->IsConvex())
69  {
70  line.liesOn = Point();
71  line.dir = Point(-lRelativePosition.Y(), lRelativePosition.X()) / sqrt(lSqDist); // Построение единичного вектора, нормального к относительному положению
72  ORCALines.push_back(line);
73  }
74 
75  continue;
76  }
77  else if (s > 1.0f && rSqDist < sqFakeRadius)
78  {
79 
80  if (right->IsConvex() && rRelativePosition.Det(NeighboursObst[i].second.next->dir) >= 0.0f)
81  {
82  line.liesOn = Point();
83  line.dir = Point(-rRelativePosition.Y(), rRelativePosition.X()) / sqrt(rSqDist);
84  ORCALines.push_back(line);
85  }
86 
87  continue;
88  }
89  else if (s >= 0.0f && s < 1.0f && lineSqDist < sqFakeRadius)
90  {
91  line.liesOn = Point();
92  line.dir = -(NeighboursObst[i].second.dir);
93  ORCALines.push_back(line);
94  continue;
95  }
96 
97 
98  Vector lLegDirection, rLegDirection;
99 
100  if (s < 0.0f && lineSqDist <= sqFakeRadius)
101  {
102 
103  if (!left->IsConvex())
104  {
105  continue;
106  }
107 
108  right = left;
109 
110  float leg1 = sqrt(lSqDist - sqFakeRadius);
111 
112  lLegDirection = Point(lRelativePosition.X() * leg1 - lRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, lRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + lRelativePosition.Y() * leg1) / lSqDist;
113  rLegDirection = Point(lRelativePosition.X() * leg1 + lRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, -lRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + lRelativePosition.Y() * leg1) / lSqDist;
114  }
115  else if (s > 1.0f && lineSqDist <= sqFakeRadius)
116  {
117 
118  if (!right->IsConvex())
119  {
120  continue;
121  }
122 
123  left = right;
124 
125  float leg2 = std::sqrt(rSqDist - sqFakeRadius);
126  lLegDirection = Point(rRelativePosition.X() * leg2 - rRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, rRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + rRelativePosition.Y() * leg2) / rSqDist;
127  rLegDirection = Point(rRelativePosition.X() * leg2 + rRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, -rRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + rRelativePosition.Y() * leg2) / rSqDist;
128  }
129  else
130  {
131  if (left->IsConvex())
132  {
133  float leg1 = std::sqrt(lSqDist - sqFakeRadius);
134  lLegDirection = Point(lRelativePosition.X() * leg1 - lRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, lRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + lRelativePosition.Y() * leg1) / lSqDist;
135  }
136  else
137  {
138  lLegDirection = -NeighboursObst[i].second.dir;
139  }
140 
141  if (right->IsConvex())
142  {
143  float leg2 = std::sqrt(rSqDist - sqFakeRadius);
144  rLegDirection = Point(rRelativePosition.X() * leg2 + rRelativePosition.Y() * fakeRadius, -rRelativePosition.X() * fakeRadius + rRelativePosition.Y() * leg2) / rSqDist;
145  }
146  else
147  {
148  rLegDirection = NeighboursObst[i].second.dir;
149  }
150  }
151 
152  ObstacleSegment *leftNeighbor = NeighboursObst[i].second.prev;
153 
154  bool isLLegForeign = false, isRLegForeign = false;
155 
156  if (left->IsConvex() && lLegDirection.Det(-leftNeighbor->dir) >= 0.0f)
157  {
158  lLegDirection = -leftNeighbor->dir;
159  isLLegForeign = true;
160  }
161 
162  if (right->IsConvex() && rLegDirection.Det(NeighboursObst[i].second.next->dir) <= 0.0f)
163  {
164  rLegDirection = NeighboursObst[i].second.next->dir;
165  isRLegForeign = true;
166  }
167 
168  Point leftCutoff = (*left - position) * invTimeBoundaryObst;
169  Point rightCutoff = (*right - position) * invTimeBoundaryObst;
170  Vector cutoffVec = rightCutoff - leftCutoff;
171 
172  const float t = (right == left ? 0.5f : ((currV - leftCutoff).ScalarProduct(cutoffVec)) / cutoffVec.SquaredEuclideanNorm());
173  const float tLeft = ((currV - leftCutoff).ScalarProduct(lLegDirection));
174  const float tRight = ((currV - rightCutoff).ScalarProduct(rLegDirection));
175 
176  if ((t < 0.0f && tLeft < 0.0f) || (left == right && tLeft < 0.0f && tRight < 0.0f))
177  {
178  Vector unitW = (currV - leftCutoff)/(currV - leftCutoff).EuclideanNorm();
179 
180  line.dir = Vector(unitW.Y(), -unitW.X());
181  line.liesOn = leftCutoff + unitW * fakeRadius * invTimeBoundaryObst;
182  ORCALines.push_back(line);
183  continue;
184  }
185  else if (t > 1.0f && tRight < 0.0f)
186  {
187  Vector unitW = (currV - rightCutoff)/(currV - rightCutoff).EuclideanNorm();
188 
189  line.dir = Vector(unitW.Y(), -unitW.X());
190  line.liesOn = rightCutoff + unitW * fakeRadius * invTimeBoundaryObst ;
191  ORCALines.push_back(line);
192  continue;
193  }
194 
195  float cutoffSqDist = ((t < 0.0f || t > 1.0f || right == left) ? std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() : (currV - (leftCutoff + cutoffVec * t)).SquaredEuclideanNorm());
196  float lLegSqDist = ((tLeft < 0.0f) ? std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() : (currV - (leftCutoff + lLegDirection * tLeft)).SquaredEuclideanNorm());
197  float rLegSqDist = ((tRight < 0.0f) ? std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() : (currV - (rightCutoff + rLegDirection * tRight)).SquaredEuclideanNorm());
198 
199  if (cutoffSqDist <= lLegSqDist && cutoffSqDist <= rLegSqDist)
200  {
201  line.dir = -NeighboursObst[i].second.dir;
202  line.liesOn = leftCutoff + Point(-line.dir.Y(), line.dir.X()) * fakeRadius * invTimeBoundaryObst;
203  ORCALines.push_back(line);
204  continue;
205  }
206  else if (lLegSqDist <= rLegSqDist)
207  {
208  if (isLLegForeign)
209  {
210  continue;
211  }
212 
213  line.dir = lLegDirection;
214  line.liesOn = leftCutoff + Point(-line.dir.Y(), line.dir.X()) * fakeRadius * invTimeBoundaryObst;;
215  ORCALines.push_back(line);
216  continue;
217  }
218  else
219  {
220  if (isRLegForeign)
221  {
222  continue;
223  }
224 
225  line.dir = -rLegDirection;
226  line.liesOn = rightCutoff + Point(-line.dir.Y(), line.dir.X()) * fakeRadius * invTimeBoundaryObst;
227  ORCALines.push_back(line);
228  continue;
229  }
230  }
231 
232 
233  size_t numObstLines = ORCALines.size();
234 
235  //Получение ORCA-линий агентов
236  //std::sort(Neighbours.begin(),Neighbours.end(), Compare);
237 
238  Line currline;
239  ORCAAgent *curragent;
240  Vector u, w;
241 
242  unsigned long minMaxNum = (param.agentsMaxNum < Neighbours.size()) ? param.agentsMaxNum : Neighbours.size();
243 
244 
245  for(unsigned long i = 0; i < minMaxNum; i++)
246  {
247  auto Neighbour = Neighbours[i];
248  curragent = dynamic_cast<ORCAAgent *>(Neighbour.second);
249  auto circlecenter = curragent->position - this->position; //(P_b - P_a)
250 
251  auto relvelocity = this->currV - curragent->currV; //(V_a - V_b)
252 
253  float radiussum = fakeRadius + curragent->fakeRadius; //(R_a + R_b)
254  float radiussum2 = radiussum * radiussum;
255  float distSq = circlecenter.SquaredEuclideanNorm();
256  float trueSqRadSum = (param.radius + curragent->param.radius) * (param.radius + curragent->param.radius);
257 
258  if(distSq < trueSqRadSum )
259  {
260  collisions++;
261  }
262 
263  if(distSq >= radiussum2)
264  {
265  w = relvelocity - (circlecenter * invTimeBoundary); //w -- вектор на плоскости скоростей от центра малой окружности (основания VO) до скорости другого агента относительно этого
266  float sqwlength = w.SquaredEuclideanNorm();
267  float wproj = w.ScalarProduct(circlecenter);
268 
269  // если эти условия выполняются, то вектор w отложенный из центра окружности-основания VO будет своим концом ближе к
270  // этой самой окружности, а значит и ближайшая точка на границе VO -- это какая-то точка на этой окружнрости
271 
272  if(wproj < 0.0f && (wproj * wproj) > sqwlength * radiussum2)
273  {
274  const float wlength = std::sqrt(sqwlength);
275  const Vector nw = w / wlength;
276  currline.dir = Vector(nw.Y(), -nw.X());
277  u = nw * (radiussum * invTimeBoundary - wlength);
278  }
279  else
280  {
281  //иначе проекция на стороны VO
282  //длина проекции вектора относительных положений на сторону VO
283 
284  float leg = std::sqrt(distSq - radiussum2);
285 
286  if(circlecenter.Det(w) > 0.0f) //если точка ближе к левой стороне VO
287  {
288  currline.dir = Vector(circlecenter.X() * leg - circlecenter.Y() * radiussum, circlecenter.X() * radiussum + circlecenter.Y() * leg) / distSq;
289  }
290  else //если точка ближе к правой стороне VO
291  {
292  currline.dir = -(Vector(circlecenter.X() * leg + circlecenter.Y() * radiussum, -circlecenter.X() * radiussum + circlecenter.Y() * leg) / distSq);
293  }
294 
295  float rvproj = relvelocity.ScalarProduct(currline.dir);
296 
297  u = currline.dir * rvproj - relvelocity;
298  }
299  }
300  else
301  {
302  const float invTimeStep = 1.0f / options->timestep;
303 
304  Vector w = relvelocity - circlecenter * invTimeStep;
305  float wlength = w.EuclideanNorm();
306  Vector wn = w / wlength;
307  currline.dir = Vector(wn.Y(), -wn.X());
308  u = wn * (radiussum * invTimeStep - wlength);
309  }
310 
311  currline.liesOn = this->currV + u * 0.5f;
312  ORCALines.push_back(currline);
313  Neighbours.pop_back();
314  }
315 
316  auto lineFail = Utils::linearProgram2(ORCALines, param.maxSpeed, this->prefV, false, this->newV);
317  if(lineFail < this->ORCALines.size())
318  {
319  Utils::linearProgram3(ORCALines, numObstLines, lineFail, param.maxSpeed, this->newV);
320  }
321 
322  Neighbours.clear();
323 }

326 void ORCAAgent::ApplyNewVelocity()
327 {
328  currV = newV;
329 }
330 
331 
332 bool ORCAAgent::UpdatePrefVelocity()
333 {
334  Point next;
335  if (planner->GetNext(position, next))
336  {
337  Vector goalVector = next - position;
338  float dist = goalVector.EuclideanNorm();
339  if(next == goal && dist < options->delta)
340  {
341  prefV = Point();
342  return true;
343  }
344 
345  if(dist > CN_EPS)
346  {
347  goalVector = (goalVector/dist) * param.maxSpeed;
348  }
349 
350  prefV = goalVector;
351  return true;
352  }
353  prefV = Point();
354  return false;
355 }

361  {
362  Agent::operator=(obj);
363  fakeRadius = obj.fakeRadius;
364  }
365  return *this;
366 }
